list.abs: Election campaigns have always Been riddled with demagogy and worse 选举活动总是充斥了煽动和坏事 By Esy_C  This was demagogy outsmarting itself 这是弄巧.

entry.tran: （政治上的）蛊惑民心，煽动民情
entry.def: You can refer to a method of political rule as demagogy if you disapprove of it because you think it involves appealing to people's emotions rather than using reasonable arguments.

means.word_mean: 1. impassioned appeals to the prejudices and emotions of the populace
